attributes.action: MAKE AN ISLAMIC COUNCIL ACCOUNTABLE TO ALL MUSLIMS IN U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many Muslim organisations that are all self appointed and mostly non representative. The Council wll be democratically elected by all Muslims. Election should be coordinated within all Mosques in U.K, vote taking place on friday, and should be organised by local councils of all boroughs in United Kingdom.

This will give an equal voice to all Muslims.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
